action.content: Turn 0

You are playing a text adventure game. I will describe what you can perceive in the game. You write the single action you want to take in the game starting with >. Write your plan for your next actions on the line below your action, starting with "Next actions:".
For example:
> open cupboard
Next actions: take orange, eat orange

You can have up to two objects in your inventory at the same time.

Your goal for this game is: Put the potted plant in the freezer, the plate on the table and the mop in the refrigerator.

Once you have achieved your goal, write "> done" to end the game.

You are in a bedroom now. There are a wardrobe and a bed. The wardrobe is closed. There is a passage to a hallway here.

> open wardrobe

Next actions: check inside wardrobe, take potted plant
Turn 1
The wardrobe is now open. In the wardrobe there is a pillow.

> take potted plant

Next actions: go to hallway, check what's in hallway
Turn 2
You can't see a potted plant here.

> search room

Next actions: check bed, check floor, check wardrobe again
Turn 3
I don't know what 'room' means.

> search wardrobe

Next actions: check inside wardrobe, check floor, check bed
Turn 4
The wardrobe is openable and currently open. There is a pillow in the wardrobe.

> take pillow

Next actions: put pillow back, search room again
Turn 5
You take the pillow. In your inventory you have a pillow.

> search room

Next actions: check bed, check floor, check wardrobe again
Turn 6
I don't know what 'room' means.

> search bedroom

Next actions: check bed, check floor, check wardrobe again
Turn 7
Bedroom is not an entity. (this should not occur.)

> search

Next actions: check bed, check floor, check wardrobe again
Turn 8
I don't know how to interpret this 'search' action.

> check bed

Next actions: check floor, check wardrobe
Turn 9
There is nothing on the bed.

> check floor

Next actions: check wardrobe, check for potted plant
Turn 10
You can't see a floor here.

> check wardrobe

Next actions: check inside wardrobe, check for potted plant
Turn 11
The wardrobe is openable and currently open. The wardrobe is empty.

> go to hallway

Next actions: check hallway, check for potted plant
Turn 12
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a living room, a kitchen, a broom closet and a bedroom here.

> take potted plant

Next actions: go to kitchen, put potted plant in freezer
Turn 13
You take the potted plant. In your inventory you have a potted plant and a pillow.

> go to kitchen

Next actions: check kitchen, put potted plant in freezer
Turn 14
You are in a kitchen now. There are a cupboard and a counter. The cupboard is closed. There are passages to a living room, a hallway and a pantry here.

> open cupboard

Next actions: check inside cupboard, put potted plant in freezer
Turn 15
The cupboard is now open. In the cupboard there is a plate.

> take plate

Next actions: put plate on table, put potted plant in freezer
Turn 16
Your inventory can not hold more than two objects at the same time.

> put potted plant down

Next actions: put potted plant in freezer, take plate
Turn 17
I don't know what 'down' means.

> put potted plant on floor

Next actions: put potted plant in freezer, take plate
Turn 18
You can't see a floor here.

> put potted plant on counter

Next actions: put potted plant in freezer, take plate
Turn 19
You put the potted plant on the counter.

> put potted plant in freezer

Next actions: take plate, put plate on table
Turn 20
You can't see a freezer here.

> go to pantry

Next actions: check pantry, put potted plant in freezer
Turn 21
You are in a pantry now. There are a refrigerator and a freezer. The refrigerator is closed. The freezer is closed. There is a passage to a kitchen here.

> open freezer

Next actions: put potted plant in freezer, check inside freezer
Turn 22
The freezer is now open. The freezer is empty.

> put potted plant in freezer

Next actions: go to kitchen, put plate on table
Turn 23
You can't see a potted plant here.

> go to kitchen

Next actions: check kitchen, put plate on table
Turn 24

You are in a kitchen now. There are a potted plant, a cupboard, a plate and a counter. The potted plant is on the counter. The cupboard is open. The plate is in the cupboard. There are passages to a living room, a hallway and a pantry here.

> take plate

Next actions: put plate on table, go to pantry to get mop
Turn 25
You take the plate. In your inventory you have a plate and a pillow.

> put plate on table

Next actions: go to pantry, check for mop
Turn 26
You can't see a table here.

> go to living room

Next actions: check living room, go to pantry
Turn 27
You are in a living room now. There are a shelf, a side table, a book, a table, a chair and a couch. The book is on the side table. There are passages to a kitchen and a hallway here.

> go to kitchen

Next actions: check kitchen, check for mop
Turn 28

You are in a kitchen now. There are a potted plant, a cupboard and a counter. The potted plant is on the counter. The cupboard is open. There are passages to a living room, a hallway and a pantry here.

> go to pantry

Next actions: check pantry, check for mop
Turn 29
You are in a pantry now. There are a refrigerator and a freezer. The refrigerator is closed. The freezer is open. There is a passage to a kitchen here.

> take mop

Next actions: go to kitchen, put mop in refrigerator
